synopsis:
A donkey has grown old and weak after having worked for human being for a long time. Realizing his prime time has passed, the donkey decides to go to Bremen to join the town musicians. On the way there, he meets a dog, a cat, and a rooster, and they find the robbersâ€™ house. Four animals chases the robbers away from the house. They make their new lives with their new home.

1st year Work 2012, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)
